jvx.surface

Class PgParmSurface

  • java.lang.Object
    • jv.object.PsObject
      • jv.project.PgGeometry
        • jv.geom.PgPointSet
          • jv.geom.PgElementSet
            • jvx.surface.PgParmSurface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, PsUpdateIf, PgGeometryIf

    public class PgParmSurface
extends PgElementSet
    A parametrized surface over a two dimensional domain. Coordinate functions may be given as strings and interactively edited. Parameter domain allows adjusting using sliders.

    Since major revision 4.0 domain and functions are copied rather than assigned. Therefore, avoid using deprecated methods although they still work.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setFunctionExpr

        public boolean setFunctionExpr(PuFunction function)
        Set coordinate functions which may be interactively edited in the control panel. Number of functions must be equal to the vertex dimension of this surface. Data of argument function is copied.
